channel.title: wardriving on brimstone's blog

item.title: Pwnagotchi
item.description: Releases https://github.com/evilsocket/pwnagotchi/releases Snippets Get version python3 -c "import pwnagotchi as p; print(p.version)" Configure laptop for usb connection ifconfig usb0 10.0.0.1 netmask 255.255.255.0 pwnagotchi will be at 10.0.0.2. Configure bluetooth tether On pwnagotchi: sudo bluetoothctl pair <mac> trust <mac>
